description: Unified color configuration for DungeonFighter-v2 - consolidates all color settings into a single file

colorTemplates.name: forest
colorTemplates.description: Ancient Forest - Dark green/green/golden/brown (ancient mystical forest)

colorTemplates.name: crystal
colorTemplates.description: Crystal Caverns - Dark magenta/magenta/cyan/white/cyan/magenta (prismatic crystal shimmer)

colorTemplates.name: shadow
colorTemplates.description: Shadow Realm - Dark/purple/magenta/very dark (mystical shadow realm)

colorTemplates.name: steampunk
colorTemplates.description: Mechanical Foundry - Brown/dark orange/red/grey (fiery mechanical forge)

colorTemplates.name: swamp
colorTemplates.description: Poisoned Swamp - Dark green/bright green/yellow/dark green (toxic poisonous swamp)

colorTemplates.name: nature
colorTemplates.description: Mystical Garden - Dark green/green/white/magenta (mystical enchanted nature)

colorTemplates.name: arcane
colorTemplates.description: Ancient Library - Dark magenta/magenta/white/blue (ancient arcane knowledge)

colorTemplates.name: desert
colorTemplates.description: Desert Oasis - Gold/orange/cyan/white/brown (desert heat with oasis water)

colorTemplates.name: ocean
colorTemplates.description: Ocean Depths - Dark blue/blue/cyan/dark (deep abyssal depths)

colorTemplates.name: mountain
colorTemplates.description: Mountain Summit - Dark/grey/white/cyan (snowy peak with sky)

colorTemplates.name: void
colorTemplates.description: Void Nexus - Very dark/dark/dark magenta/very dark (absolute emptiness)

colorTemplates.name: generic
colorTemplates.description: Bandit Hideout - Brown/dark orange/grey/brown (rustic earthy hideout)

colorTemplates.name: title_dungeon
colorTemplates.description: Title screen DUNGEON gradient - black to warm white to yellow/gold

colorTemplates.name: title_fighter
colorTemplates.description: Title screen FIGHTER gradient - black to warm orange to vibrant orange

colorTemplates.name: title_dungeon_yellow_orange
colorTemplates.description: Title screen DUNGEON - yellow and orange gradient (no white)

colorTemplates.name: title_fighter_yellow_orange
colorTemplates.description: Title screen FIGHTER - orange and yellow gradient (no white)

colorTemplates.name: weapon_class
colorTemplates.description: Weapon class theme - red to orange to yellow (combat/offensive)

colorTemplates.name: armor_class
colorTemplates.description: Armor class theme - blue to cyan to white (defensive/protective)

colorTemplates.name: head_armor
colorTemplates.description: Head armor theme - cyan to blue to white (mental/protective)

colorTemplates.name: chest_armor
colorTemplates.description: Chest armor theme - blue to cyan to white (core protection)

colorTemplates.name: feet_armor
colorTemplates.description: Feet armor theme - green to cyan to white (mobility/grounded)

colorTemplates.name: damage_effect
colorTemplates.description: Damage effects - red to orange to yellow (destructive)

colorTemplates.name: magical_effect
colorTemplates.description: Magical effects - magenta to cyan to blue (mystical)

colorTemplates.name: defensive_effect
colorTemplates.description: Defensive effects - blue to cyan to white (protective)

colorTemplates.name: death_effect
colorTemplates.description: Death/dark effects - dark red to red to magenta (corruption)

colorTemplates.name: divine_effect
colorTemplates.description: Divine effects - white to yellow to white (holy)

colorTemplates.name: enhanced_common
colorTemplates.description: Enhanced common rarity - light grey (basic but clean)

colorTemplates.name: enhanced_uncommon
colorTemplates.description: Enhanced uncommon rarity - green to white (nature/improvement)

colorTemplates.name: enhanced_rare
colorTemplates.description: Enhanced rare rarity - blue to cyan to white (valuable)

colorTemplates.name: enhanced_epic
colorTemplates.description: Enhanced epic rarity - magenta to cyan to white (exceptional)

colorTemplates.name: enhanced_legendary
colorTemplates.description: Enhanced legendary rarity - orange to white to yellow (legendary shimmer)

colorTemplates.name: enhanced_mythic
colorTemplates.description: Enhanced mythic rarity - magenta to cyan to yellow to blue (prismatic)

colorTemplates.name: enhanced_transcendent
colorTemplates.description: Enhanced transcendent rarity - white to magenta to cyan to blue (ethereal)

keywordGroups.name: damage
keywordGroups.comment: Removed: 'damage', 'hit', 'strike', 'attack' - too common, appear in stats

keywordGroups.name: heal
keywordGroups.comment: Removed: 'health', 'hp' - too common, appear in stats

keywordGroups.name: experience
keywordGroups.comment: Changed colorPattern from 'Y' (color code) to 'golden' (template); removed 'level' (too common)

keywordGroups.name: enemy_types
keywordGroups.comment: Removed specific enemy names (goblin, orc, etc.) - should use explicit coloring; kept only generic types; changed from 'R' to 'damage' template
